Project Summary¶

Goals of the project¶

Allows users to create profiles and be able to save a watchlist, viewed list, and favorite list of movies. Users should be able to search a database of movies to find more information about them. Users should be able to rate and review movies and view others rates and reviews. But only be able to edit their own.

Parts that are not working¶

Users cannot rate and review movies yet.
